cells.content: Independence from United Kingdom control over Afghan foreign affairs in 1919.
(Dita e Pavar?sis?) Declared by Ismail Qemali in 1912 and signalled the end of five centuries of Ottoman rule.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1981.
Independence from the Soviet Union in 1991.
Independence from Allies of World War II in 1955
?October 18 Independence from the Russian Empire in 1918; May 28 Independence re-declared from the Soviet Union in 1991
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1973.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1971
Independence was declared from Pakistan and this led to a nine month war ending on December 16, 1971.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1966.
Liberation of Minsk from German occupation by Soviet troops in 1944.
Independence from the Netherlands (Belgian revolution). Leopold of Saxe-Coburg-Saalfeld takes the oath as first king of the Belgians in 1831.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1981.
Independence from the Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia in 1992.
(Dia da Independ?ncia) Declared Independence from Portugal on that date in 1822.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1966.
Declared Independence from Spain on that date in 1818. Actually, Chileans celebrate the date of the first Government Junta, September 18. This date was not recognized as until 25 April 1844.

Independence from Yugoslavia in 1991. Independence was declared, after a referendum, by the Parliament on June 25 (the date is celebrated as Statehood Day); EU pressured Croatia into a three month moratorium, and on October 8 the ties with SFRJ were formally severed.
Independence from the United Kingdom on August 16, 1960, but Cyprus Independence Day is commonly celebrated on October 1.[1]
As Czechoslovakia, marking independence from Austria-Hungary on October 28, 1918. Jan 1 As the Czech Republic after the split of Czechoslovakia
Independence from Portugal in 2002 (recognition, East Timor was invaded by Indonesia from 1975 to 1999, officially it never ceased to be considered as administrated by Portugal).

Proclaimed independence from Spain on August 10, 1809, but failed with the execution of all the conspirators of the movement on August 2, 1810. Independence finally occurred on May 24, 1822 at the Battle of Pichincha.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1978
Independence from Haiti in 1844, after a 22-year occupation.
February 18 Independence from the Russian Empire in 1918; August 20 Independence re-declared from the Soviet Union in 1991
Fiji Independence Day Independence from United Kingdom in 1970.
Declaration of independence from Ottoman Empire in 1821. Start of the Greek War of Independence
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1957.
05-26 ?May 26 Day of First Republic in 1918; April 9 Independence from USSR in 1991.
Independence Day of Finland Independence from Russia in 1917.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1966.
Declaration of independence from United Kingdom in 1974.
(also known as Swatantrata Divas among Indians) Independence from the United Kingdom in 1947.
Independence from Kingdom of Denmark in 1918.
Declaration of Independence from France in 1804.

(Yom Ha'atzmaut) Independence from the British Mandate of Palestine which took place on May 14, 1948 (5 Iyar 5708 in the Hebrew calendar). It is actually celebrated on Tuesday, Wednesday or Thursday nearest to 5 Iyar, so it actually occurs between the 3rd and 6th of Iyar, which may fall between April 15 and May 15 in the Gregorian calendar.
Proclamation of the Irish Republic commencing the Easter Rising on April 24, 1916. Independence from the United Kingdom.
Declaration of Independence day (Hari Proklamasi Kemerdekaan R.I.) from the Netherlands in 1945. The Netherlands acknowledged Indonesian independence and sovereignty in 1949.
(Gwangbokjeol) Independence from Japan in 1945. (Independence from Japan was declared on March 1, 1919, August 15 is the official Liberation Day of Korea.)
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1961.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1962.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1946.
Independence from the Soviet Union in 1991.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1963.
Independence from Italy. However, celebration of this day was abolished after the "revolution" of September 1, 1969.

Act of Independence of Lithuania: Independence from the Russian and German Empires in February, 1918; Act of the Re-Establishment of the State of Lithuania: independence from the Soviet Union in March, 1990.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1964.
Independence from Russia on November 18, 1918. Independence from Soviet Union on May 4, 1990
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1966.
(Grito de Dolores) Independence from Spain declared in 1810. Recognized on September 27, 1821
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1968.
Independence from the Soviet Union in 1991
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1965 join[2]
(Hari Merdeka) Independence from the United Kingdom in 1957
(Independence Day (Malta)) Independence from the United Kingdom in 1964.
Independence from South African mandate in 1990
Independence from France and Spain in 1956
Independence from State union with Serbia, in 2006
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1948

(Araw ng Kalayaan) The proclamation date of the 1898 Declaration of Independence by Emilio Aguinaldo during the Philippine Revolution is celebrated as Independence Day. The Republic of the Philippines was recognized as an independent nation on July 4, 1946.
(?wi?to Niepodleg?o?ci) Restoration of Poland's independence in 1918 after 123 years of partitions by Austro-Hungary, Prussia, and Russia.
(D?a de Independencia) Independence from Spain in 1811.

Emancipation and Liberation from Spain on November 28th in 1821, but Panama was a part of Colombia. The 1903 separation and independence from Colombia is celebrated as the official national Panamanian independence day on November 3, Separation Day,also known as Independence from Colombia).
Independence from Australia of the former Territories of New Guinea, and Papua, in 1975.
(Yaum e Azadi) Independence from the United Kingdom on 27 Ramadan ul Mubarik, August 14, 1947.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1983.
Supremacy of Russian laws over Soviet ones in the territory of the RSFSR is declared in 1990.
(Den na nezavisnosta or ??? ?? ????????????) Independence from Yugoslavia in 1991.
Independence from the Ottoman Empire in 1877.
Restoration of Portugal's independence (from Spain) in 1640.
The assumption of power of Sheikh Jassem bin Mohamed al-Thani, ancestor of the current ruling family, in 1878.
Marks exit / independence from United Kingdom in 1978.

(Independence and Unity Day) Date of the release of the official results of the independence plebiscite in 1990, confirming secession from Yugoslavia. (Statehood Day) Declared independence from Yugoslavia in 1991.
Declaration of Independence in 1992 (only a remembrance day), de jure independence came on January 1, 1993 after the division of Czechoslovakia (public holiday).
(National Day Parade) Marks exit / separation from Malaysia in 1965.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1961.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1976.
The beginning of the Serbian revolution against Ottoman occupation in 1804.
Declaration of independence from United Kingdom in 1961.
Independence from the Soviet Union in 1991.
(Swiss National Day) Alliance against the Holy Roman Empire in 1291.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1968.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1956.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1948.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1931. Not a public holiday. Union of South Africa formed on May 31, 1910 and Republic of South Africa declared on May 31, 1961
(Fourth of July) Declaration of Independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain in 1776.
(National Day) Independence from the United Kingdom in 1971.
(D?a de la Independencia) Declaration of independence from Brazil in 1825.
Lateran Treaty signed with Italy in 1929.
Independence from United Kingdom and France in 1980.
Proclamation of independence from Japan and France in 1945.
Declaration of independence from Spain in 1811.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1965.
Independence from the United Kingdom in 1962.
Tonga was never a colony, but late King's birthday was celebrated on 4 July.
Turkey becomes a republic following the dissolution of the Ottoman Empire Turkish War of Independence
Declaration of independence from France in 1956.
(Den' Nezalezhnosti) Independence from the Soviet Union on August 24, 1991. Unification of Ukraine on January 22, 1919.[4]
Declaration of independence from the Soviet Union in 1991.[3]
South Yemen Declaration of independence from United Kingdom in 1967.
Declaration of independence from United Kingdom in 1964.
Declaration of independence from United Kingdom in 1980.
Independence from United Kingdom control over Afghan foreign affairs in 1919.
